name: No Dice
description:
A game made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 83: Dread (also dice). Hold your own in an abandoned house against waves of zombies, with 6 unique weapons being randomly assigned to you.

Controls-

WASD/Arrow keys: horizontal movement
W/Up arrow/Space: jump
M1: Fire weapon
E: repair window
Enter/return: Next wave

Full attribution: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1scQ-KoiDKYVrsmSraaeEule9yjQSxOAFuNvj4JztXNU/...
